title: Send Help (Mac User)
body: I recently tried opening and Launching league of Legends but whenever I click launch, nothing happens and the launcher just quits. I've tried everything from reinstalling it to going through RADS files and deleting things and I'm just trying to play league with my friends please help me

replies.body: I've been seeing a lot of our Mac playerbase having this weird "permission" issue. It seems like your OS isn't letting League launch the way it's supposed to. I've had luck with some players being able to manually update to the latest MacOS, but it doesn't seem to have been a 100% fix. Let's try having you grab the latest [**Mac update**](https://itunes.apple.com/us/app/macos-sierra/id1127487414?mt=12&ls=1) you can, and let me know if that helps.

same issue but i cannot update due to having the 2007 mid, been following this issue for that last couple days now really since the last patch. Was wondering if a solution has been found because i still can play
